text: Come On kids ! let's get moving
Get those body  warmed up because here we are about to begin

Head shoulders knees and toes,
knees and toes

Head shoulders knees and toes,
knees and toes

And eyes and ears
And mouth and nose

Head shoulders knees and toes,
knees and toes
Alright kids! we are making on to our feet, tummies, arms and chins

Feet and tummies arms and chin,
arms and chin.

Feet and tummies arms and chin,
arms and chin.
And eyes and ears and mouth and chin

Feet and tummies arms and chin,
arms and chins
Let me sing you wiggling those arms and fingers and shaking those legs and hips
Here we go ! for the last time

Hands and fingers legs and lips
leg and lips.

Hands and fingers legs and lips,
leg and lips.
And eyes and ears and mouth and hips

Hands and fingers leg and lips,
leg and lips.
